subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dave Bolland and Patrick Sharp scored in the game’s first two minutes, and the Blackhawks beat the host Stars, 4-1, before a crowd of 19,099, the largest since the team moved to Dallas in 1993.
snippet: Dave Bolland and Patrick Sharp scored in the game’s first two minutes, and the Blackhawks beat the host Stars, 4-1, before a crowd of 19,099, the largest since the team moved to Dallas in 1993.
